alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 8:10PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lee, southeastern St. Francis, southwestern Crittenden, northwestern DeSoto, northern Tunica and southwestern Shelby Counties through 845 PM CST... At 809 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hughes, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Memphis, Hughes, Memphis, Walls, Edmondson, Horseshoe Lake, Anthonyville, Lake Cormorant, Simsboro, Brickeys, Pinckney, Lynchburg, Robinsonville, Clack, Commerce, Louise, Beck, Democrat, Glover and Riceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
